Text.val: -- Fetch translated message from database
03.09.2014 AS SCR#19120 skip escaping of apostrophe characters if CV2
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
31.01.2011 SH SCR16185 Disabled Verifiy operation if application runs as
application server
16.07.2009 SH SCR14735 Introduced table MEST, to fetch message translations
from database instead of using MlsTrans()
14.04.2009 SH SCR14463 Removed call old debugger version6
25.11.2008 AS SCR#14149 introduced Y/N flag IBOLT (logical name)
25.01.2008 AK SCR13320 added extra paremeter : PI.DoNotEscape
For internet application servers (logigal name INTERNETSERVER=Y) we need to
escape the apostroph with a \ character. Otherwise we get a script error.
//24-08-2004 JP SCR #6830 extend picture of 3rd parameter (= pi.Parameter3)
from A50 to A128 to get message box from OID400 working
05.08.2003 SH SCR4008/4029 Enabled writing of message to joblog only
- if PI.Batchmessage and PI.Msgw = TRUE, otherwise to naby text will be written
- to joblog
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added new parameter pi.msgw and if pi.Batchmessage = TRUE
- and pi.msgw = TRUE GB722 will be called to bring job to message wait on AS400
26.11.2002 AS there's no need to read .ini to know if we are an appserver.
there's a global variable in program main.
07.10.2002 SH Set pi-language-code as systemlanguage if <> systemlanguage
05.06.2002 JJ verifying to log "Application Error" only if MESG_ICON=16 or 32
(errors and questions, the AS/400 cannot answer the latter)
Call dll can't work on AS/400
If AS400='Y' , make verify to Log
-- Set pi.Language code as system language (Uses mostely for ICA programs)
-- Reset to system language if was changed, see T.P.
-- No message available or message is empty --> Present error in message box
-- A message is available
... by default use translated message from database (table MEST)
... if not exists in MEST, try to get the translation from the MLS file
... if message is fetched from MLS file, the reserved characters for line breaks
must by replaced with Cr / Lf
@Info: If there exists no translation of the message in MEST and the MLS file,
then the system message MESG_MESSAGE is used, without any translation
-- Merge variables (max 3) to error messages
... substring1
... substring2
... substring3
-- Title composition
-- If Internet application server escape apostroph characters with a backslash
character to avoid script errors.
-- Open interactive message box (online programs only)
... error --> GB007 was called from a batch program with pi.BatchMessage = False
write error to joblog
... present interactive message box
-- GB007 is called from batch programs --> send message string back to calling
... set job to message wait
